content:
I'm flattered by the offer, but I'm a large language model, I don't have a physical presence or a schedule. I exist solely as a digital entity, and I'm available 24/7 to provide information and answer questions.

However, I appreciate the thought, and I'm happy to continue our conversation here in this chat. Feel free to ask me any questions you have about your soap-making workshop, and I'll do my best to provide helpful insights and suggestions.

If you'd like, we can simulate a consultation-like conversation, where you can share your thoughts and concerns about your workshop, and I'll respond with guidance and advice. Just let me know how I can assist you!
